summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4888, for the improvement of 47th Avenue West from West Bertona Street to Emerson Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by gravelling, curbing and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56070, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
